index.about.title: International Expo & Forum
index.about.forum.heading: About the Forum
index.about.forum.body: We are an international team of professionals dedicated to organizing high-level global events — including forums, exhibitions, and lectures — that promote innovation, cultural exchange, and international cooperation.
index.about.why.heading: Our Mission
index.about.why.body: Our goal is to create a seamless registration experience for foreign guests and to bring together diplomats, government representatives, experts, and innovators from around the world to connect, collaborate, and inspire new ideas.
index.about.guests.heading: Who We Welcome?
index.about.guests.body: The platform is open to foreign delegations, embassy representatives, cultural missions, media professionals, and invited international guests participating in major public and professional events.

about_expo.hero.title: About the Expo
about_expo.hero.subtitle: Your guide to the International Turkmen–China Exhibition: goals, format, and opportunities for participants.
about_expo.intro.title: Turkmen-China Expo Vision and Goals
about_expo.intro.lead: The exhibition aims to become a key platform for strengthening the strategic partnership between Turkmenistan and the People’s Republic of China, showcasing their economic, technological, and cultural potential, and creating new opportunities for cooperation across various sectors. Present the achievements of both countries in industry, agriculture, transport, logistics, IT, and innovation.
about_expo.intro.bullets.0: Strengthen business relations and stimulate new cooperation projects.
about_expo.intro.bullets.1: Demonstrate export opportunities and investment potential.
about_expo.intro.bullets.2: Promote integration in logistics, science, education, and culture.
about_expo.intro.bullets.3: Support digital transformation and the adoption of advanced technologies.
about_expo.why.title: Why to participate?
about_expo.why.points.0: Partner search: an opportunity to establish direct contacts with government agencies, investors, and companies from Turkmenistan and China.
about_expo.why.points.1: Access to new markets: showcase products and technologies to a targeted international audience.
about_expo.why.points.2: Investment & joint projects: a chance to secure funding, launch cooperation programs, and strengthen export capacity.
about_expo.why.points.3: Knowledge exchange: access to best practices, innovations, and expert insights.
about_expo.numbers.title: By the Numbers
about_expo.numbers.sector_list: Energy, Hydrocarbon extraction industry, Construction, Transport and logistics, Agricultural sector, Food, Innovation and IT, Light Industry, Heavy Industry, Manufacturing, Motor Transport and Special Equipment, Tourism
about_expo.map.title: Flexible options for every concept and occasion
about_expo.cta.exhibitor_text: Choose any setup — from compact stands to large pavilions. Whether it’s a formal showcase, a product demo, or a creative activation, we provide flexible formats and support to match your goals.
about_forum.hero.title: Turkmen-China Business Forum & Expo 2026
about_forum.hero.subtitle: Strengthening strategic partnership for sustainable development
about_forum.intro.title: Turkmenistan International Business Forum
about_forum.intro.p1: The forum aims to strengthen the strategic partnership between Turkmenistan and the People's Republic of China by creating a platform for constructive dialogue and discussion of key areas of bilateral cooperation. The focus is on sustainable development, trade and economic cooperation, digitalization, scientific and technological progress, and environmental sustainability.
about_forum.intro.p2: Participants will consider prospects for increasing trade turnover, developing logistics, e-commerce, and investment cooperation, including financing infrastructure projects. Particular attention will be paid to transport integration in the Eurasian space and the improvement of international transport corridors.
about_forum.intro.p3: The forum also covers issues of the digital economy, IT projects, technological innovations, academic exchange, and the involvement of youth initiatives. The program includes plenary sessions, thematic sessions, round tables, bilateral talks, and agreement signing ceremonies. The event promotes mutual understanding, expands business ties, and forms a solid foundation for the implementation of long-term joint projects.
about_forum.why.title: Why participate?
about_forum.why.points.0: New opportunities for business and partnerships. Participants expand their business contacts, find promising areas for cooperation, and develop mutually beneficial projects.
about_forum.why.points.1: Demonstration of achievements and innovations. The forum allows participants to showcase the economic potential, modern technologies, industrial products, and export opportunities of both countries.
about_forum.why.points.2: Access to key development sectors. From industry and agriculture to logistics, digitalization, science, and education, participants gain direct interaction with leading players in these areas.
about_forum.why.points.3: Participation in high-level business event. Round tables, presentations, B2B and B2G meetings facilitate networking, exchange of experience, and promotion of joint initiatives.
about_forum.numbers.title: By the Numbers
about_forum.numbers.sector_list: - B2G & B2B meetings, - Round table, - Presentations, - Memorandum signing ceremony

official.hero.title: Official Support
official.hero.subtitle: Backed by official governmental and business representatives
official.card.title: Commercial, Investment and Business opportunities in Turkmenistan 2025
official.body.p1: Innovation and growth are at the heart of every successful society. Progress is built when people share ideas, combine their skills, and work together to create solutions that improve daily life. From small changes to major breakthroughs, innovation shapes the way we live and connect with the world.
official.body.p2: Collaboration plays a key role in turning ideas into reality. When businesses, governments, and individuals unite, they unlock greater opportunities. Shared knowledge and collective effort make it possible to overcome challenges and build stronger, more resilient communities.
official.body.p3: The future depends on how we use today’s opportunities. By embracing technology, investing in education, and encouraging creativity, we prepare for sustainable development and long-term success. Every step forward, no matter how small, contributes to shaping a brighter tomorrow.
